name: CallsMusic-Plus
description: Telegram Voice Chat Music Player Bot Based On Callsmusic with Extrac Features!

SESSION_NAME.description: Streamer(Dummy) Account's Pyrogram String Session. Read wiki.

SUDO_USERS.description: ID's of Sudo Users. They admins everywhere (separate each id by space)

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max Time Limit For One Song. Fill in Minutes

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Log Channel Where Bot Logs Go!

DATABASE_URL.description: Mongo Db url. Get it from https://www.mongodb.com/

ARQ_API_KEY.description: Your ARQ API key! Get your own with @ARQRobot !

UPSTREAM_REPO.description: Github Repo Url. Only needed if you are using your own Fork!

THUMB_URL.description: Thumbnail Url To Use in play, search commands. Add this only if you need a custom one instead of default thumbnail

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Your Telegram Channel's Username without '@' . Not Needed by Default!
